member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM
member.summary: Provides status information while a synchronization is in progress. This structure is used with the method and corresponds to a single synchronization item.

member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM.mask
member.summary: Flags from the enumeration that specify which members of this structure are used.

member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM.dwStatusType
member.summary: One of the values from the enumeration.

member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM.iProgValue
member.summary: An integer that indicates the progress value.

member.name: SYNCMGRPROGRESSITEM.iMaxValue
member.summary: An integer that indicates the maximum progress value.
